activities: Themis from time to time is asked to handle HR data for our European clients and also client confidential physician data from EU member states.   The Themis data center is in the USA, hence the need for this agreement.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Computer Software - (CSF)Health Care Services - (HCS)Information Services - (INF)
personaldata: Client HR data, and client confidential data about physicians
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); for all other data: BBB EU SAFE HARBOR at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
